quoteText: Ryver may disclose your personal information if Ryver believes that it is reasonably necessary in order (i) to comply with law, regulation, or legal request. (ii) to protect the safety of any person. (iii) to address fraud, security, or technical issues. or (iv) to protect Ryverâ€™s rights or property.

tosdr.case: The service is transparent regarding government requests or inquiries that may involve user data.
